channel.title: Client stuck at "Connecting to update server"? =(
channel.description: Could somebody please help me? I just compiled my client because I edited and added alot of stuff within the past hour, and now when I go to play and test everything out, its stuck at "Connecting to update server".... Please help?

item.title: Client stuck at "Connecting to update server"? =(
item.dc:creator: @Frostfire Frostfire
item.description:
@Frostfire wrote:

Javafire:

be sure you have the cache in the proper place, if not search for the name in your file searcher or byte searcher and edit it. very simple fix.

my cache is in my client folder… i copied it and placed it in my (C:) drive but it didnt make a difference… and no it doesnt say error_js5_connect because i have 2 batch files i need to run for my server to be playable… i have “runserver” which loads everything, and “run” which loads the client… i need to wait for runserver to accept connections before i can start “run”…

Read full topic
item.source: Client stuck at "Connecting to update server"? =(

item.title: Client stuck at "Connecting to update server"? =(

item.description:
@Prologue wrote:

if it says error_js5_connect that means you the host isnt running the server because its 508.
